124
INITIATING THE INHERITANCE OF A PERSON WHO HAS BEEN PRONOUNCED DEAD
(1) The day on which the decision on the proclamation of a person's death is final shall be the day of the initiation of the inheritance, unless another day is determined in the decision.
(2) In the case of the proclamation of a person's death, periods which in accordance with this Act start on the day of the initiation of the inheritance shall start on the day when the decision on the person's death becomes final.
